items.label: skill
items.text: Built multi-agent job tailoring workflow with FastAPI orchestrator and vector memory; reduced drafting time by 80%

items.label: project
items.text: Deployed LLM planner and reasoning agents to map job requirements to CV bullets using embeddings; prototyped in Cursor with Claude/Gemini

items.label: publication
items.text: Authored a write-up on modular LLM pipelines using FAISS/Chroma-style memory and n8n clean-up flows
